title: Humorlost
description: Kareena and Rian fell fast and hard, but neither could have imagined the events that their love would unfold. With deep conflict between securing his future in politics and his love for Kareena, Rian faces insurmountable odds, as Sean would stop at nothing to push his son into the political spotlight. Follow their journey from New England to Florida, and across the Atlantic to Ireland as dark and dangerous adversaries play a roll in his familyâ€™s life. Only his father knows the full extent of the consequences that would befall his family if he did not up hold his end of a bargain that was forged years earlier.
author: Carol Donahue
